content: cc p1 sl1 wyif k1 sl1 wyif p1 sl1 wyif sl1 wyib sl1 wyif turn row 1a rs with mc k1 sl1 wyif p1 sl1 wyif twice yo continue working across the full row as established row 1b rs with cc sl1 wyib p1 sl1 wyib k1 twice yo slip the mc yo stitch sl1 wyib insert the lhn into the stitch below the mc stitch you just slipped from back to front and bring the right leg of that stitch on the lhn p2tog tbl the lifted stitch and the cc stitch on the lhn continue working across the full row as established row 2a ws with mc working across the row as established to the last mc stitch before the yo sl all remaining stitches row 2b ws with cc working across the row as established to the last cc stitch before the yo sl1 wyib slip the next mc sts turn row 3a rs with mc insert your rhn under the yo stitch from back to front k2tog the newly lifted yo on the lhn with the next mc stitch working across the row as established to the end of row row 3b rs with cc slip the yo stitch sl1 wyib insert the lhn into the mc stitch you just slipped from back to front and bring the right leg of that stitch on the lhn p2tog tbl the lifted stitch and the cc stitch on the lhn continue working across the full row as established row 4a ws with mc working across the row as established to the end of row row 4b ws with cc working across the row as established to the end of row notes always cross yarns at turns to maintain a closed edge do not pull yarnovers tightly allow the fabric to settle naturally buttonholes are fully reversible and visually balanced on both sides of the garment buttonhole 2 on rs row 6 work buttonhole 2 into the left front band before continuing with raglan shaping buttonhole 3 on rs row 14 work buttonhole 3 into the left front band before continuing with raglan shaping raglan shaping table size m legend ● fl / fr front left / front right same count so shown as front sts each ● sl / sr left & right sleeves same count so shown as sleeve sts each ● body total 2×front + back + underarm ● ⚪ no increase ● 🔵 sleeve increase © 2026 qing studio ltd this pattern is for personal use only no part of this publication may be reproduced distributed or sold without written permission
